Welcome to Class 2 – The Sensational Seacoles!

Our class teacher is Mrs Royston and Mrs Andrew on Fridays.

Our teaching assistants are Mrs Northrop, Mrs Gale and Ms Heeley.

 

We are really pleased to be back in school with everyone!

Each day we have English, Maths, phonics and reading teaching.

Throughout the week we have PE twice a week and in the afternoons we spend time covering the other subjects, such as Art, Music etc.

 

Homework

Reading every day for 10 minutes with your child is crucial. Please sign and record this in their reading diary. The children bring home spellings each week to practise and this also needs five minutes each day to build up their skills and confidence. We will be introducing times tables in Year 2, so counting in patterns of 2s, 5s and 10s will support this understanding.
